entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build error 'The following files are missing entries in the templated manifest' #60526
  • Serializing public interface with internal implementation works with JSON but not with XML #60523
  • System.IO errors: The process cannot access the file ... #60521
  • Equivalent of DefaultContractResolver.CreateProperties override in System.Text.Json #60518
  • Azure Function: Unable to load System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #60516
  • HttpClient Content-Type Header #60513

Closed

  • Stack overflow in Mono interpreter on some System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests tests #38817
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: string.ConstantEmpty #60508
  • System.Drawing.Tests.PenTests.Ctor_Brush_Width<SolidBrush> test fail #60480
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • SortedList<TKey, TValue> added GetKeyAtIndex, GetValueAtIndex, and SetValueAtIndex #60520
    community-contribution
  • `ValueArray` - a compliment type to the `Span`, which owns its data without indirections. #60519
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • API Implementation: Add Indexer to Vectors #60517
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

Merged

  • [hackathon] CreateSpan<T> support of a RVA field of a primitive type #60525
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [hackathon] Fix no xunit tests run #60522
  • [mono][interp] Fix sufficient stack check when using interpreter #60514
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix CreateSpan build failure #60510
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Add limited support for backtracking Regex single char loops to simplified code gen #60385
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Code optimization (and possibly coverage optimization) for System.Text.Json #60509
    area-System.Text.Json
  • issue 56835 make ordered dictionary kv collection implement i list #60060
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable runtime tests to run on Android arm32 #51642
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
